creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Multi-colored apron made from ikat material; one pocket with zipper and two decorative ribbons; edge is cut in scalloes and waist is pleated with two woven ties; pink edging follows scalloped hem; purple cording forms decorative patters along edges, pocket openings and center panel.
title: Woman's apron
